arguments.description: - (Optional) The DNS zone to which the access rule should be added. Will be resolved to upon creation.
- (Optional) The DNS zone to which the access rule should be added.
- (Required) The action to apply to a matched request. Allowed values: "block", "challenge", "whitelist", "js_challenge"
- (Optional) A personal note about the rule. Typically used as a reminder or explanation for the rule.
- (Required) Rule configuration to apply to a matched request. It's a complex value. See description below.
